4 DUIM-DCs Library

4.1 Overview

The DUIM-DCs library provides color support to the DUIM library. The library contains a single module, duim-dcs, from which all the interfaces described in this chapter are exposed. Section 4.3 on page 116 contains complete reference entries for each exposed interface.

Throughout this chapter, a drawing context consists of the combination of ink, color, brush, pen, palette, and shapes that make up patterns and images.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
